descripcion: Ask your local SQM agronomist for a Specialty Plant Nutrition programme in accordance with your local needs and requirements.

imagenes.span: Symptoms of P- deficiency in blueberry.
Front- strawberry plant growing in a N- deficient substrate. Back- strawberry plants having benn fertilized with N.
Raspberry bush. Left, normal. Right, nitrogen deficient.
Leaf K- deficiency symptoms in cherry.
Leaf Mg- deficiency symptoms in greenhouse grown 'Mahaleb' cherry rootstock. The nutrient solution applied to the trees was devoid of Mg.
Symptoms of Fe- deficiency in strawberry.
Leaf symptoms of Fe- deficiency in raspberry.
Fe- deficiency in a young blueberry plant.
Leaf Mn- defiency symptoms in raspberry.
